DOC.brief_title: Comparing Pain Experience Between Patients Who Have Who Have Not Undergone Dermatologic Procedures
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty subject enrol study : 10 subject cosmetic procedure past 10 subject procedure . For subject , pain tolerance three area assess : temple , midface/cheek , abdomen . In two area face ( temple midface/cheek ) , small sterile needle insert skin along three application follow device FDA approve use face : ultrasound device ( Ulthera ) , pulse dye laser ( VBeam ) , radiofrequency ( Thermage ) device . Additionally , abdomen receive three four device randomize order : small sterile needle insertion , pulse dye laser ( VBeam ) pulse , radiofrequency ( Thermage ) exposure ( ultrasound device , Ulthera , use abdomen currently FDA approve indication ) . Subjects ask rate pain application individual site use pain scale . In addition , subject complete questionnaire regard pain experience possibly related factor procedure .
